page.title: 05COMMUNICATION
page.content:
There is a village Post Office which is open 6 days a week. It sells sweets and stationery as well as stamps. There is a morning and afternoon collection of mail from the 6 post boxes in the village. There are 2 Post Ladies who ride bicycles who deliver the morning post to houses. The afternoon delivery is made by a Postman in a van.
The majority of the population have their own private telephone. For those who are without a phone there are 3 public telephone boxes for anyone to use although they are not in very good repair.
The Parish Newsletter is called { {LINK}and it contains local news and events. This is produced monthly by the Reverand Taylor.
